nodes.text: Ronto stew was a type of stew made from rontos, saurian herbivores native to the Outer Rim planet Tatooine. Around 34 ABY, the smuggler Izal Garsea reminisced that while living on the Outer Rim planet Batuu during her early childhood, her mother, Ixel Garsea, had never been the type of neighbor to share ronto stew recipes.
Ronto stew was first mentioned in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida Córdova.
